column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/305ccaa27551efa33fcaf637e76310654738f428 for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
ACK. mapNodeState requires cs_main as well.\n
